alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 12:50PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Pasco, northwestern Polk and northeastern Hillsborough Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1250 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lutz to 7 miles north of Brandon to near Fish Hawk. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Lakeland, Plant City, Temple Terrace, Bartow, Zephyrhills, Dade City, Fish Hawk, Lutz, Brandon, St. Leo, Hillsborough River State Park, Zephyrhills South, Zephyrhills West, Land O Lakes, Medulla, University, Wesley Chapel South, Combee Settlement and Greater Northdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Polk
